name: Dreamland Delivery and the Nightmare Knight
blurb: Join Aggie, Sammie, & a fantastical crew as they run, jump, & crash  through dangerous and chimerical dreaming worlds!

rewards.reward: DREAMER:  Thank you for backing our project!  For your support will receive special "Thank You", and your name in the credits of the game under "Kickstarter Backers".

DREAM SCOUT: GET THE GAME! (Kickstarter Exclusive!)  All previous tier rewards and your very own early release digital download of Dreamland Delivery for Mac, PC,or Linux, and  Kickstarter Exclusive \u201cScout costumes\u201d for player characters Aggie and Sammie!
HOLIE MOLIE'S SWORD: EXCLUSIVE SOUNDTRACK!  All previous tier rewards and an early release of the amazing soundtrack of Dreamland Delivery as a digital download with exclusive extended tracks!

PIG ICARUS' WINGS: EXCLUSIVE PRINT & VIDEO! (Kickstarter Exclusive!) All previous tier rewards and an Exclusive Limited Edition 11x17\u201d print of the Dreamland Cast in addition to a digital download video of our artists deconstructing the Bunyip character concept painting and modeling it for use as an NPC in the game! \r\n\r\n *International backers supplied with digital content only.

SAMMIE'S TRICERATOPS: DIGITAL ART BOOK & VIDEO!  All previous tier rewards. A fully colored Dreamland Delivery and the Nightmare Knight Art book as a digital download and a video of our animator rigging and animating one of our creative enemies in the game!\r\n *International backers supplied with digital content only.

AGGIE'S BUTTERFLY:  T-SHIRT & VIDEO!  All previous tier rewards.  Your choice of one of four  Exclusive Limited Edition t-shirts with your name along with other backers at this tier or higher on the back and a digital download video of our level designer taking a level from conceptual intent and sketches to completion in Unity.\r\n *International backers supplied with digital content only.

DARK HEROES: EXCLUSIVE CHARACTER SKINS!   All previous tier rewards with Kickstarter Exclusive  nightmare costume versions of Aggie, Sammie, Holie Molie, and Pig Icarus. *International backers supplied with digital content only.

MAESTRO CHEF'S SWEET POTATO CASSEROLE!: HARD COPY ART BOOK & VIDEO! All previous tier rewards and a limited edition full color copy of the art book signed by the entire art team of Puca Studios!  A digital download video of our amazing concept artist designing and painting the Bunyip NPC!   *International backers supplied with digital content only.

DREAMLAND EXPLORER: DESIGN A CHARACTER COSTUME!  All previous tier rewards.  You help design and customize a costume for the dreamers in the game to unlock!  Additionally you'll receive a digital download video of one of our animators rigging and animating the Bunyip NPC!  *International backers supplied with digital content only.

DREAMLAND DELIVERER: PUCA GEAR!  All previous tier rewards and we\u2019ll send you your own Kickstarter Exclusive Limited Edition Puca Studios backpack with the official embroidered  Puca Studio Dreamland Delivery and the Nightmare Knight logos.  Additionally, you\u2019ll receive credits as Associate Producer in the game!   *International backers supplied with digital content only.

DREAMLAND CHAMPION: YOU'RE IN THE GAME!  All previous tier rewards and we put you in the game!  Our artist will recreate your likeness as a Dreamland Deliverer with your choice of pajama color and style as character in the game!  *International backers supplied with digital content only.

DREAMLAND WEAVER: DESIGN A COMPANION! All previous tier rewards and you\u2019ll help design alternate stuffed animal  companions for Aggie and Sammie and your personalized character to use!   *International backers supplied with digital content only.

DREAMLAND SAVIOR: GAME DESIGN DOCUMENT AND ART BOOK!  All previous tier rewards and a coffee table edition of the Game Design Document coupled with the art book to make a fantastic collector\u2019s keepsake.  Puca Studios will also fly you to Indianapolis, Indiana with a ticket to GenCon, put you in a hotel, and provide you a lunch and dinner!(North America only)   Finally, you will receive the title of Executive Producer in the credits of the game!   *International backers supplied with digital content only.

KNIGHTMARE KNIGHT: YOU'RE A MINI-BOSS!  All previous tier rewards incuded.  We will make you one of the mini-bosses of Dreamland Delivery and the Nightmare Night!  *International backers supplied with digital content only.
